org.dhbw.geo.backend

Class JSONConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dhbw.geo.backend.JSONConverter

  • public class JSONConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Oliver on 21.06.2015. Class which exposes static methods for constructing Java objects from JSON strings and vica versa.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSONConverter()

      Constructs a DBFence object from a JSON string from the backend.

      Constructs a DBConditionFence object from a JSON string from the backend.

      Constructs a list of DBConditionFence object from a JSON string from the backend.
